p: 200 g of fresh guava leaves deliquesced with 95% ethyl alcohol. Mixture obtained after 72 h was filtered and dried from alcohol by evaporation process. Solvent free mixture was mixed with distilled water to liquidity. This extract was used in the formulation of guava hand sanitizer gel by adding gelatin and glycerin in small proportion of alcohol ( Yaun and Vasquez, 2017).
